common_questions: Why is that relevant to me or this job?
You just mentioned that you oversee two teams and nothing else. Can you elaborate a bit more about what teams you manage?
The job role description was a bit generic, can you please elaborate about the job role and what team the position is for?
Can you then tell me about the verification environment you use and what the day-to-day job role might look like?
what division do you want to work in?
explain to them how grateful you are but you need to think about your career and take t

red_flags: applied a ton, I had connections
apply on the website, there's too many people that do that
really study that much the day before an interview (that's for the weeks before), I just go on walks, run, do jumping jacks, get my blood flowing so t
have experience just apply to smaller companies, instead of FB/Apple/Google/MSFT
use Arial, Calibri, Times New Roman

process_insights.format: Mix of phone screen, technical, behavioral, on-site, virtual
